memberdef.name: WSH_SHELL_CMD_DEF_OPT_TABLE
memberdef.initializer: X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_HELP, WSH_SHELL_OPT_HELP()) \ X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_INTERACT, WSH_SHELL_OPT_INTERACT()) \ X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_DEF, WSH_SHELL_OPT_NO(WSH_SHELL_OPT_ACCESS_ANY)) \ X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_EXEC, WSH_SHELL_OPT_WO_PARAM(WSH_SHELL_OPT_ACCESS_ANY, "-x", "--exec", "Get info about accessible commands")) \ X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_USER, WSH_SHELL_OPT_WO_PARAM(WSH_SHELL_OPT_ACCESS_ANY, "-u", "--user", "Get info about users")) \ X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_CLS, WSH_SHELL_OPT_WO_PARAM(WSH_SHELL_OPT_ACCESS_ANY, "-c", "--cls", "Clear screen")) \ X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_HIST_CLEAR, WSH_SHELL_OPT_WO_PARAM(WSH_SHELL_OPT_ACCESS_ANY, "-r", "--histrst", "Reset history storage")) \ X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_HIST_PRINT, WSH_SHELL_OPT_WO_PARAM(WSH_SHELL_OPT_ACCESS_ANY, "-p", "--histprint", "Print history storage")) \ X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_DEAUTH, WSH_SHELL_OPT_WO_PARAM(WSH_SHELL_OPT_ACCESS_ANY, "-d", "--deauth", "DeAuth and destroy history")) \ X_CMD_ENTRY(WSH_SHELL_DEF_OPT_END, WSH_SHELL_OPT_END())

briefdescription.para: Macro defining the default shell command options using X-Macros.

detaileddescription.para: This macro expands into a list of X_CMD_ENTRY() calls, each representing an available option for the default shell command. Used for both option structure definitions and enumeration.

briefdescription.para: Enumeration of supported options for the default shell command.

detaileddescription.para: Each value corresponds to an entry from the WSH_SHELL_CMD_DEF_OPT_TABLE.

memberdef.name: WshShellDefCmd
memberdef.initializer: = { .Groups = WSH_SHELL_CMD_GROUP_ALL, .Name = "def", .Descr = "Default command for configuring and querying the shell interface", .Options = OptArr, .OptNum = WSH_SHELL_ARR_LEN(OptArr), .Handler = WshShellCmdDef, }

memberdef.argsstring: (const WshShellCmd_t *pcCmd, WshShell_Size_t argc, const WshShell_Char_t *pArgv[], void *pCtx)
memberdef.name: WshShellCmdDef

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer to the default shell command structure.

detaileddescription.para: This function returns a constant pointer to the static command structure WshShellDefCmd, which describes the default command used for configuring and querying the shell interface.

simplesect.para: const WshShellCmd_t* Pointer to the default command structure.
